name: Salesforce APN -  AWS S3 Opportunity-Inbound Folder
description:
**Trigger:** Upon Saving an 'Amazon Partner Network Request' record, all the information from this record is put into a JSON that is sent to an S3 bucket

**Description:** Create a way for users to indicate that they would like to send their opportunity to Amazon Partner Network as a joint deal. This involved the creation of a new object called 'Amazon Partner Network Request', which contains information about the opportunity that they are sharing with the APN. This ticket will be for packaging the data from this record into a JSON that will then be sent via workato to an S3 bucket. 

**Actions:** It takes the data from apn object and formatted as a json and upload the json file on s3 opportunity-inbound folder.

extended_input_schema.name: since_offset
extended_input_schema.label: When first started, this recipe should pick up events from
extended_input_schema.hint: When starting the recipe for the first time, picks up Salesforce records from the specified date and time. Once the recipe has been run or tested, this value cannot be changed.

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable - Check blank fields in APN Record

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Callable - Check blank fields in APN

flow_id.name: Callable - Check blank fields in APN Record

block.comment: Check if any of the fields are blank.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

input.message: CUSTOMER PAIN POINT/NEED: #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.DescriptionoftheOpportunity__c')}. NAME/TITLE OF PRIMARY CUSTOMER CONTACT: #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.PrimaryContacts__c')}  WHAT CAN THE AWS REP DO TO HELP YOU WIN THE OPP: #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.WhatcanAWSdotohelpyou__c')} STAGE: #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.AWSStage__c')} PRE-SALES ACTIVITY: #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.OppStatusNextSteps__c')} PROPOSED SOLUTION(S): #{_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.Rapid7SolutionsBeingProposed__c')}

block.name: declare_list
block.title: Create apnData list
block.comment: Creating apn data list with all inputs schema

opportunities.contractVehicle:
=(_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.ShippingCountry__c') == "United States" and 
(_('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.Industry__c') == "Government" or _('data.salesforce.dcf9290e.Industry__c') == "Education")).is_true? ? "Varies depending on partners involved." : skip

block.name: upload_file

extended_input_schema.name: region
extended_input_schema.label: Region
extended_input_schema.hint: Go to Bucket>Properties>Static website hosting to find your region in the 'Endpoint' URL, e.g. us-west-2

extended_input_schema.name: object_name
extended_input_schema.label: Object name
extended_input_schema.hint: Exact, case sensitive name of the object/file

extended_input_schema.name: accelerate
extended_input_schema.label: Use accelerated endpoint
extended_input_schema.hint: Default is false. Enter true to use accelerated endpoint. Go to Bucket>Properties>Transfer acceleration to check if accelerated endpoint is enabled

extended_input_schema.name: content_type
extended_input_schema.label: Content-Type metadata
extended_input_schema.hint: The Content-Type metadata to be attached to the file when uploading. Default is "multipart/form-data".

extended_input_schema.label: Canned ACL
extended_input_schema.hint: Learn more about canned ACL here.
